title: Remove character limit on lyrics input

requirements.text: Update the LyricsInput component to remove the maximum character limit validation (currently 2,000 characters), allowing users to enter unlimited lyrics text while keeping the minimum 20 character requirement

quotes: Yes but when writing on lyrics instead of 2,000 characters make it unlimited amount of characters that the user can use in lyrics

acceptanceCriteria: The lyrics textarea accepts any number of characters without upper limit validation
The minimum 20 character requirement remains enforced
The character count display shows the current count without showing a maximum
The submit button remains enabled as long as the minimum 20 character requirement is met
No error messages appear when typing beyond the previous 2,000 character limit

constraints: Keep the minimum 20 character validation requirement
Do not modify the backend LyricsRequest data model or submitLyricsRequest function
nonGoals: Changing the style prompt input or keyword suggestions functionality
Modifying backend validation for lyrics length
Adding new features to the lyrics input component
